Remediations.Description: Go Gold today to take advantage of exclusive Xbox discounts, special deals, and offers.
With Xbox Game Pass, you can play more great games anytime.

Affirmations.Description: with your Xbox Game Pass membership

LocalizedProperties.ProductDescription: Hue is a vibrant, award-winning puzzle adventure, where you alter the world by changing its background colour. You explore a dangerous grey land, unearthing coloured fragments on a journey to find your missing mother. As obstacles match the background, they disappear, creating new and exciting puzzles - full of peril, mystery… and colours unseen.
